The focus is on the Thirty Years War, but it is certainly possible to use them for other conflicts as well. Examples of these include, but are not limited to: the English Civil War and the wars between Sweden and Poland. I have intentionally left the late 17th century out, as I feel this period is better covered by the standard rules.

"My ambition has been to include enough new/changed elements to produce the right "period feel". The game should not feel like a WSS game with different figures.
